projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: My new portfolio. I rebuilt it from the ground up, and I intend to use it as a testing ground for some interactivity.

projects.name: TwitchStreams
projects.description: A single page app where a user can create an account, login and see the currently popular live streams. The upcoming feature include favorite streams, password reset, and better look.
